attributes.action: Make Type 1 Diabetes Hybrid Closed Loop Systems available to all in the UK now.
attributes.additional_details: People with Type 1 diabetes deserve the same life‑changing technology wherever they live. It’s time to ensure fair, nationwide access to Hybrid Closed Loop Systems so that every person in the United Kingdom can manage their condition safely, confidently, and without discrimination based on their address.
attributes.background:
Make Type 1 Diabetes Hybrid Closed Loop Systems available to all in the UK now.

No more postcode lottery. No more unequal access.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737226
